login.password_incorrect: Password incorrect! Check for your password!
login.account_banned: Your account have been banned! Contact your admin to un-ban! Reason:{[reason]}
login.unknown: Unknown error appeared! Contact your admin to solve!
login.user_not_exist: This user is not exist! Check the username or sign up a new account.

register.user_already_registered: This account is already registered! Change another username.
register.password_not_match: Two passwords are not match! Check your password!

warning.beta_version: You are using beta version of Hi~ Buluo! If you have problems, go to official website to find the solution.
warning.admin_warning: System administrator gave you a warning: {[warning]}
warning.email_variation: You need to finish email variation to use your account! No email found? Send again or contact system admin.
